attributes.action: Call a General Election due to Government's inability to effectively lead.
attributes.additional_details: Through numerous u-turns, and a complete inability to follow their own rules, the Conservatives have demonstrated their incompetence in running the country. We as the people have the right to raise our lack of confidence in them, and we would respectfully request that a General Election be called immediately.
attributes.background: For a General Election to he called so that the people of this country are able to fully voice our concerns through our democratic right to vote.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033

You might also like to sign these petitions:

'Introduce legislation to create mechanism for the voters to dissolve Parliament': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597718

''Make it a requirement for a general election to be held when a PM leaves office': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603334

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
